channel.title: Plugins on Dkron - Distributed job scheduling system
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Dkron - Distributed job scheduling system

item.title: Developing plugins
item.description: Developing a Plugin **Advanced topic!** Plugin development is a highly advanced topic, and is not required knowledge for day-to-day usage. If you don't plan on writing any plugins, we recommend not reading the following section of the documentation. Developing a plugin is simple. The only knowledge necessary to write a plugin is basic command-line skills and basic knowledge of the Go programming language. Note: A common pitfall is not properly setting up a $GOPATH.
